title: Miracle Skill Vending Machine - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Level System   Male Protagonist   Transported into a Game World
author: 나니모노
description:
Another day has passed, and now it’s already been a year since I came to this another world.

Something that could only be thought of as a gift from the goddess appeared.

I have a Miracle Skill Vending Machine at home!

“Miracle Skill vending machine……!”>
